programme.desc: After the glitz and glamour of Monaco last weekend, Formula 1 heads to another historic track, Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya, for the Spanish Grand Prix. Lee McKenzie, David Coulthard, Mark Webber, Billy Monger and Ariana Bravo present the highlights of the Qualifying session. Last year Charles Leclerc took pole position after his dramatic early spin in Q3. Can he take a consecutive pole in Barcelona? Or will the speed of the Red Bull cars lock out the front row?
